Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.22883213]Herpesvirus 1 McIntire (HHV-1MC):inhibition of virus replication in Vero cells(IC50=500 µM);HHV-1 clinical strain:inhibition of virus replication in Vero cells(IC50=1500 µM);Coxsackie virus 971 PT B2:inhibition of virus replication in HEp-2 cells(IC50=1040 µM);inhibition of virus replication in LLC-MK2 cells(IC50=540 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.22883213]No cytotoxic against Vero, Hep-2 and LLC-MK2 cells up to 1174 µM.
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: New alloferon analogues synthesis and antiviral properties.
Literature.Author: Kuczer M, Majewska A, Zahorska R.
